memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, bool *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_node_reset

briefdescription.para: Reset the target node and remove it from the network.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t page, uint8_t *rsp, struct net_buf_simple *comp)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_comp_data_get

briefdescription.para: Get the target node's composition data.

detaileddescription.para: If the other device does not have the given composition data page, it will return the largest page number it supports that is less than the requested page index. The actual page the device responds with is returned in rsp.
This method can be used asynchronously by setting rsp and comp as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Composition data page, or 0xff to request the first available page.
Return parameter for the returned page number, or NULL.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_beacon_get

briefdescription.para: Get the target node's network beacon state.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Status response parameter, returns one of BT_MESH_BEACON_DISABLED or BT_MESH_BEACON_ENABLED on success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t key_net_idx, uint8_t *status, uint8_t *phase)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_krp_get

briefdescription.para: Get the target node's network key refresh phase state.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and phase as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Key Refresh variable to fill.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t key_net_idx, uint8_t transition, uint8_t *status, uint8_t *phase)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_krp_set

briefdescription.para: Set the target node's network key refresh phase parameters.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and phase as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the new Key Refresh phase. Will return the actual Key Refresh phase after updating.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t val, uint8_t *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_beacon_set

briefdescription.para: Set the target node's network beacon state.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: New network beacon state, should be one of BT_MESH_BEACON_DISABLED or BT_MESH_BEACON_ENABLED.
Status response parameter. Returns one of BT_MESH_BEACON_DISABLED or BT_MESH_BEACON_ENABLED on success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t *ttl)

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting ttl as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t val, uint8_t *ttl)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_ttl_set

briefdescription.para: Set the target node's Time To Live value.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting ttl as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Status response parameter. Returns one of BT_MESH_FRIEND_DISABLED, BT_MESH_FRIEND_ENABLED or BT_MESH_FRIEND_NOT_SUPPORTED on success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: New Friend feature state. Should be one of BT_MESH_FRIEND_DISABLED or BT_MESH_FRIEND_ENABLED.
Status response parameter. Returns one of BT_MESH_FRIEND_DISABLED, BT_MESH_FRIEND_ENABLED or BT_MESH_FRIEND_NOT_SUPPORTED on success.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Status response parameter. Returns one of BT_MESH_GATT_PROXY_DISABLED, BT_MESH_GATT_PROXY_ENABLED or BT_MESH_GATT_PROXY_NOT_SUPPORTED on success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t val, uint8_t *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_gatt_proxy_set

briefdescription.para: Set the target node's Proxy feature state.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: New Proxy feature state. Must be one of BT_MESH_GATT_PROXY_DISABLED or BT_MESH_GATT_PROXY_ENABLED.
Status response parameter. Returns one of BT_MESH_GATT_PROXY_DISABLED, BT_MESH_GATT_PROXY_ENABLED or BT_MESH_GATT_PROXY_NOT_SUPPORTED on success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t *transmit)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_net_transmit_get

briefdescription.para: Get the target node's network_transmit state.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting transmit as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Network transmit response parameter. Returns the encoded network transmission parameters on success. Decoded with BT_MESH_TRANSMIT_COUNT and BT_MESH_TRANSMIT_INT.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t val, uint8_t *transmit)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_net_transmit_set

briefdescription.para: Set the target node's network transmit parameters.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting transmit as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

simplesect.para: BT_MESH_TRANSMIT.

parameterdescription.para: Network transmit response parameter. Returns the encoded network transmission parameters on success. Decoded with BT_MESH_TRANSMIT_COUNT and BT_MESH_TRANSMIT_INT.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t *status, uint8_t *transmit)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_relay_get

briefdescription.para: Get the target node's Relay feature state.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and transmit as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Status response parameter. Returns one of BT_MESH_RELAY_DISABLED, BT_MESH_RELAY_ENABLED or BT_MESH_RELAY_NOT_SUPPORTED on success.
Transmit response parameter. Returns the encoded relay transmission parameters on success. Decoded with BT_MESH_TRANSMIT_COUNT and BT_MESH_TRANSMIT_INT.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t new_relay, uint8_t new_transmit, uint8_t *status, uint8_t *transmit)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_relay_set

briefdescription.para: Set the target node's Relay parameters.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and transmit as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: New relay state. Must be one of BT_MESH_RELAY_DISABLED or BT_MESH_RELAY_ENABLED.

simplesect.para: BT_MESH_TRANSMIT.

parameterdescription.para: Status response parameter. Returns one of BT_MESH_RELAY_DISABLED, BT_MESH_RELAY_ENABLED or BT_MESH_RELAY_NOT_SUPPORTED on success.
Transmit response parameter. Returns the encoded relay transmission parameters on success. Decoded with BT_MESH_TRANSMIT_COUNT and BT_MESH_TRANSMIT_INT.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t key_net_idx, const uint8_t net_key[16], uint8_t *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_net_key_add

briefdescription.para: Add a network key to the target node.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t *keys, size_t *key_cnt)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_net_key_get

briefdescription.para: Get a list of the target node's network key indexes.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting keys or key_cnt as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Net key index list response parameter. Will be filled with all the returned network key indexes it can fill.
Net key index list length. Should be set to the capacity of the keys list when calling. Will return the number of returned network key indexes upon success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t key_net_idx, uint8_t *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_net_key_del

briefdescription.para: Delete a network key from the target node.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t key_net_idx, uint16_t key_app_idx, const uint8_t app_key[16], uint8_t *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_app_key_add

briefdescription.para: Add an application key to the target node.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Network key index the application key belongs to.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t key_net_idx, uint8_t *status, uint16_t *keys, size_t *key_cnt)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_app_key_get

briefdescription.para: Get a list of the target node's application key indexes for a specific network key.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and ( keys or key_cnt ) as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Network key index to request the app key indexes of.
App key index list response parameter. Will be filled with all the returned application key indexes it can fill.
App key index list length. Should be set to the capacity of the keys list when calling. Will return the number of returned application key indexes upon success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t key_net_idx, uint16_t key_app_idx, uint8_t *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_app_key_del

briefdescription.para: Delete an application key from the target node.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Network key index the application key belongs to.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

briefdescription.para: Get a list of all applications bound to a SIG model on the target node.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_mod_sub_overwrite

briefdescription.para: Overwrite all addresses in a SIG model's subscription list with a group address.

detaileddescription.para: Deletes all subscriptions in the model's subscription list, and adds a single group address instead.
This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Element address the model is in.
Group address to add to the subscription list.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t elem_addr, uint16_t sub_addr, uint16_t mod_id, uint16_t cid, uint8_t *status)

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t elem_addr, const uint8_t label[16], uint16_t mod_id, uint16_t cid, uint16_t *virt_addr, uint8_t *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_mod_sub_va_overwrite_vnd

briefdescription.para: Overwrite all addresses in a vendor model's subscription list with a virtual address.

detaileddescription.para: Deletes all subscriptions in the model's subscription list, and adds a single group address instead.
This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and virt_addr as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Element address the model is in.
Virtual address label to add to the subscription list.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t elem_addr, uint16_t mod_id, uint8_t *status, uint16_t *subs, size_t *sub_cnt)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_mod_sub_get

briefdescription.para: Get the subscription list of a SIG model on the target node.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and ( subs or sub_cnt ) as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Element address the model is in.
Subscription list response parameter. Will be filled with all the returned subscriptions it can fill.
Subscription list element count. Should be set to the capacity of the subs list when calling. Will return the number of returned subscriptions upon success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint16_t elem_addr, uint16_t mod_id, uint16_t cid, uint8_t *status, uint16_t *subs, size_t *sub_cnt)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_mod_sub_get_vnd

briefdescription.para: Get the subscription list of a vendor model on the target node.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and ( subs or sub_cnt ) as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: Element address the model is in.
Subscription list response parameter. Will be filled with all the returned subscriptions it can fill.
Subscription list element count. Should be set to the capacity of the subs list when calling. Will return the number of returned subscriptions upon success.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

sub shall not be null.

memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_hb_pub_set

briefdescription.para: Set the target node's Heartbeat publication parameters.

detaileddescription.para:
The target node must already have received the specified network key.
This method can be used asynchronously by setting status as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.
pub shall not be NULL;

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.name: bt_mesh_cfg_node_identity_set

briefdescription.para: Set the Node Identity parameters.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used asynchronously by setting status and identity as NULL. This way the method will not wait for response and will return immediately after sending the command.

parameterdescription.para: New identity state. Must be one of BT_MESH_NODE_IDENTITY_STOPPED or BT_MESH_NODE_IDENTITY_RUNNING
Network key index the application key belongs to.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

Identity response parameter. Must be one of BT_MESH_NODE_IDENTITY_STOPPED or BT_MESH_NODE_IDENTITY_RUNNING

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_comp_p0 *comp, struct net_buf_simple *buf)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_comp_p0_get

briefdescription.para: Create a composition data page 0 representation from a buffer.

detaileddescription.para: The composition data page object will take ownership over the buffer, which should not be manipulated directly after this call.
This function can be used in combination with bt_mesh_cfg_comp_data_get to read out composition data page 0 from other devices:

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct bt_mesh_comp_p0 *comp, struct bt_mesh_comp_p0_elem *elem)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_comp_p0_elem_pull

briefdescription.para: Pull a composition data page 0 element from a composition data page 0 instance.

detaileddescription.para: Each call to this function will pull out a new element from the composition data page, until all elements have been pulled.

simplesect.para: A pointer to elem on success, or NULL if no more elements could be pulled.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_comp_p0_elem *elem, int idx)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_comp_p0_elem_mod

briefdescription.para: Get a SIG model from the given composition data page 0 element.

parameterdescription.para: Element to read the model from.
Index of the SIG model to read.

simplesect.para: The Model ID of the SIG model at the given index, or 0xffff if the index is out of bounds.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_comp_p0_elem *elem, int idx)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_comp_p0_elem_mod_vnd

briefdescription.para: Get a vendor model from the given composition data page 0 element.

parameterdescription.para: Element to read the model from.
Index of the vendor model to read.

simplesect.para: The model ID of the vendor model at the given index, or {0xffff, 0xffff} if the index is out of bounds.
